title: The Time Shifters Chronicles volume 2
description: A Spellbinding Epic Time Travel boxed setAn ancient people who can move through time or space... but not both at the same time. Akalya of the Harekaiian, a nomadic spirit who lives invisibly among the ordinary people of Los Angeles, must discover who is behind the hunt for her people, when no one should have known they existed. Through an apparent accident of fate, she becomes the only one of her people who can save them from the enemy who hunts them and she must risk everything, even her life, to protect the others of her kind. A time travel Mystery replete with time travel Physics, The Time Shifters Chronicles will take you on an exciting journey through time and space.Episodes Six through Ten include: Gravity Spike, Sweet Child of Time, A Secret Twice Hidden, Remember the Future and The Book of Revelations.
author: Shanna Lauffey
